title: Server & Network - Test ISP Failover
description: A technician needs to test the automatic internet failover at a client site with two ISP connections.

tasks.description: Notify the client of the planned brief outage for the test.
tasks.expected_outcome: The client is aware of the test.

tasks.description: Simulate a failure of the primary ISP connection by disconnecting its cable from the firewall.
Verify that the firewall automatically fails over to the secondary ISP connection and that internet access is restored within moments.
tasks.expected_outcome: The test is successful, proving the failover configuration works as expected.
